solution_line_template: The truck driver can go {miles_per_gallon} * {gallons_in_tank} = <<{miles_per_gallon}*{gallons_in_tank}={miles_from_current_gas}>>{miles_from_current_gas} miles on the gas in his tank.
He needs to go {total_distance_needed} - {miles_from_current_gas} = <<{total_distance_needed}-{miles_from_current_gas}={remaining_miles_needed}>>{remaining_miles_needed} more miles.
Thus, the truck driver needs to put {remaining_miles_needed} / {miles_per_gallon} = <<{remaining_miles_needed}/{miles_per_gallon}={gallons_needed}>>{gallons_needed} more gallons of gas in his semi.
